initiate.description: Initiate (create) a session, returns a token.

validate.description: Validate a session, returns expired or not.

ping.description: Show the session is still in use.

invalidate.description: Invalidate a session, it will no longer be honoured.

read_by_token.description: Read a session by providing its token.

read_by_user.description: Read a user's authenticated sessions by providing its ID.
